text: Hurricane Irene was a 2011 Atlantic hurricane, which reached Category 3 on the Saffirâ€“Simpson Hurricane Scale, that struck the Virgin Islands, Puerto Rico, Hispaniola and the Bahamas, resulting in very serious damage. It also struck the East Coast of the United States and Canada. It formed on August 20 and dissolved on August 29. In summer/autumn 2011, the name Irene was retired from future use. It was replaced by Irma for 2017. == References == Category:2011 in weather Category:Category 3 Atlantic hurricanes Category:Hurricanes in the United States Category:2011 in the United States Category:21st century in Puerto Rico Category:2010s in the Bahamas Category:Retired tropical cyclone names
title: Hurricane Irene
